page.title: 15A TYPICAL THURSDAY IN 1985
page.content: I woke up at 7.30am and got dressed into my summer uniform:white blouse and pink skirt.At 7.40am I had my breakfast:a bowl of cornflakes.At 8.20 my friend Jill Errington came for me to go to school.At about 8.40 my friends arrived and we talked until the bell went.We put our trainers on for assembly.We had{cookery}all morning with Mrs Hetherington.We made jam tarts.At 12.00 we had dinner:hot dog,chips,trifle and applejuice.Then games.We played{hockey}which is OK. Then{French}which I DETEST and after which I went home at 3.40.I did my homework and had my dinner:roast chicken and chips. I went out to play for half an hour in the park,came in,watched television then went to bed at 9.30pm.
